title: Customer Success Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Mosaic
Interview Descriptions: I was screened by a recruiter, and then met with the team's lead. Got a lot of information about the company on that call. It's helpful to come on to the call with concrete data and KPI's of your success at a previous role
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at Mosaic?

title: Direct Support Professional (DSP) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Mosaic (Macomb, IL) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: Interview process went by smoothly, the interviewer asks you basic interview questions and if you do well then you’ll interview with a manager from one of the houses.. if they like you then you get the job
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself, and what would you do if you were in this situation type of questions.

title: Direct Support Professional Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Mosaic
Interview Descriptions: Interviewers were direct and easy going. It was a multiple interview process, so I met with multiple different people. Everyone was kind and made me feel comfortable. They seem to care about those they serve and want the best possible applicants on their team
Interview Questions: What would you do if a client was sitting on the floor screaming in the mall?

title: BAPM Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Mosaic in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: Multiple rounds with very proficient SMEs. Take time to explain the company. Opportunity to ask questions. Collaborative approach to solving questions. Very good experience overall . Good company with good approach to candidates
Interview Questions: Business Tech Org Collaboration Leadership

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Mosaic in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was comfortable, relaxed, and professional. I enjoyed learning about the vision of the company, a thorough understanding of the business and job description. I enjoyed this interview process and speaking with everyone.
Interview Questions: What do you look for in your supervisor?

title: Direct Support Personnel Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Mosaic (Dover, DE) in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: A phone call from headquarters. A two step ppd and drug test. Interview with house manager. Background check. Not too lengthy usually no longer than 4 weeks total for the entire process.
Interview Questions: What made you want to apply to Mosaic?

title: Manager, Direct Support Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Mosaic
Interview Descriptions: The process was very unclear and left myself as the candidate continually having to reach out. The interview was nice, but new in the role and couldnt answer a couple questions. After the interview I was told they'd be reaching out and still havent herd back after almost two weeks.
Interview Questions: What is your experience working with direct reports?

title: Database Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Mosaic (New Toronto, ON) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: it was great and the team was very kind and the interviewer was also very accomodating and made me feel comfortable as if i had known her for a while
Interview Questions: why did you chose to apply here?

title: Direct Support Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Mosaic (Terre Haute, IN) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: You fill out your application online through there website, First, they contact you by phone to do a phone screening, then they do an in-person interview if you get past the screening, if you get the job there is some paperwork and background check to fill out, then there are a few weeks of training, then you start working in your actual position being a caretaker.
Interview Questions: What was the worst thing about working at ___________?

title: Dsa Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Mosaic (Liberal, KS)
Interview Descriptions: They asked basic questions and it was in person with a few of the people from the office and another staff and person in service.  Mosaic will literally hire anybody as long as you can pass a drug test, you have a diploma-high school or GED and pass a background check.
Interview Questions: What would you do if you are out shopping and the client you were with had an accident?

title: Dsa Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Mosaic (Hastings, NE) in Dec 2018
Interview Descriptions: Took about a week. Applied online, then got a call asking if I could do a phone interview the next day, then asked if I could do a sit down interview, then a job shadowing and then I got offered the job.
Interview Questions: They asked if I had kids and how many and if I had daycare for them.

title: Dsa Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Mosaic (Macomb, IL)
Interview Descriptions: Simple questions. Nothing too difficult. Just basic questions about yourself and what you have done. The interview was probably about an hour, i heard back within a few days. There is a 1 month paid training which was simple to complete.
Interview Questions: What are your goals

title: Caregiver Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Mosaic
Interview Descriptions: They hire if you had the skill necessary needed for the job. They made sure in the interview to not just ask you questions, but also tell you about the company.
Interview Questions: Why do you want this job?

title: Senior Sourcing Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Mosaic (Lithia, FL) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Applied online April 2017. Initial phone screen with an internal recruiter, then an in-person interview, panel style. No feedback after the interview. I received a system-generated email that I didn't get the job. Terrible experience
Interview Questions: Basic interview questions. "Tell me about yourself", "where do you want to be in 5 years". They asked "what is your personal brand" which I think is totally irrelevant.

title: DSM Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Mosaic
Interview Descriptions: After I applied online there was a telephone screening, followed by a in person interview with a supervisor and another interview (another  day) with the ED, and one other person.
Interview Questions: Typical Situational Questions

title: CSS Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Mosaic (Nevada, IA) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: Went into the main office in Nevada. The people were really nice and helpful but also very unorganized. They made the job seem better than it was. I was told over the phone that I was selected for a PRN position and when I got there they acted like they didn't know what I was taking about.
Interview Questions: Why do you think you're a good candidate for the position?

title: Direct Support Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Mosaic (Kansas City, KS) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied the beginning of April 2016.  It took until June of 2016 to take classes I had already taken for another company.  It took until July of 2016 to start working in the residential homes even though I had done this exact same work since 2011 as well as several years in the late 80s/early 90s.
Interview Questions: What was my experience?

title: Cms Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Mosaic (Omaha, NE) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: Easy. Two different interviews. First, one is with HR and took the drug test right there. Then the second one was in the house that they want to assign you to.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Mosaic?

title: Dsa Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Mosaic (Terre Haute, IN)
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed and asked several questions about my capability and interests/experience. It was mainly just talking and getting a feel for why I wanted to work with Mosaic. It was a positive experience, they were all really nice and I got to meet some clients during my interview.
Interview Questions: If I was comfortable cooking and cleaning,etc.

title: Brand Experience Agent Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Mosaic (Vancouver, BC) in Oct 2015
Interview Descriptions: None. They were so desperate to hire someone that they would just hire you on the spot. They have huge labor shortages for their contract positions. Everyone is pretty nice and they aren't hard on you because they just want to retain you as an employee.
Interview Questions: Do I have a serving it right card

title: Dsa Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Mosaic (Rockford, IL) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: It was a one on one interivew, held in there office, right on the spot. It was a very easy interview. It lasted about 15 minutes. I recieved an offer two days later.
Interview Questions: What experience did I have working in this field?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Mosaic in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: I had a phone screen with the human resources department. This led to an in person interview, which was with a panel including the HR department, the executive director, and another RN from a different agency. Following the interview, I met some of the individuals in services. It was a very positive experience.
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself; strengths; weaknesses; etc. Typical basic interview questions.

title: Prefer Not To Say Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 months. I interviewed at Mosaic (Omaha, NE)
Interview Descriptions: Dysfunctional.  Had three interviews over a six month period.  They don't call you back and tell you what is going on.  You have to call them constantly and quite often you don't receive a call back.  They won't provide you a salary range during the process so you don't know if you are wasting your time.
Interview Questions: A number of stupid interview questions that likely tells you there is not much thought put into the hiring process.

title: Dsa Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Mosaic (Macomb, IL) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: video, 10 questions. my interviewer was very nervous, but I found out I got the job two days later. Its almost as if they are desperate for people. They call all your references and you have to take an 8th grade reading test and pass
Interview Questions: What is integrity?
